concept.title: Time Feature
concept.shortdesc: The Time feature increases productivity and empowers employees to take action quickly. It enables both employees and managers to view key analytics.

conbody.p: Time provides many capabilities by role.

strow.stentry: Access employee timesheets to act on them and to view labor metric defaults
Create an administrative team, giving managers access to employees who do not report directly to them
View insights into team time and labor summary information
Create time codes (duration-based or hourly-based), pay types, and labor metrics
View notifications, alerts, errors, and exceptions

conbody.p: A setting must be enabled in UltiPro in order for an employee to use the Time feature (UltiPro Menu > My Team > select employee > Workforce Management tab > Time).
